io::InputStream Class Reference
[Input/output library]

#include <InputStream.h>

Inheritance diagram for io::InputStream:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Base class of all input stream classes.


Public Member Functions

virtual int available () const =0
 Returns the number of bytes that can be read from the stream without blocking.
virtual int read (void *data, int size)=0
 Tries to read specified number of bytes from the stream.

 Tries to skip over n bytes from the stream.

virtual int io::InputStream::available (   )  const [pure virtual]
 

Returns the number of bytes that can be read from the stream without blocking.

Exceptions:
IOException 

Implemented in io::ByteArrayInputStream, io::FileInputStream, and io::FilterInputStream.

virtual int io::InputStream::read (  void *  data,
int  size
)  [pure virtual]
 

Tries to read specified number of bytes from the stream.

Doesn't block the caller if specified number of bytes isn't available.

Returns:
Number of bytes actually read.
Exceptions:
IOException 

Implemented in io::ByteArrayInputStream, io::DataInputStream, io::FileInputStream, and io::FilterInputStream.

virtual int io::InputStream::skip (  int  n  )  [virtual]
 

Tries to skip over n bytes from the stream.

Returns:
Number of bytes actually skipped.
Exceptions:
IOException 

Reimplemented in io::DataInputStream, and io::FilterInputStream.
